question: Which among the following river islands is not located in India?
explanation:
Sandwip island is located on the river Meghna in Bangladesh.Â 
The Shivanasamudram island is located on the banks of river Kaveri in India
The Umananda island is located on the banks of river Brahmaputra in India
Majuli is a river island on the river Brahmaputra in the state of Assam, India. It is the first island to be made a district in India.
